body: mind control and rather weird. So, the guy is typical harem protagonist. Nothing special, but he’s childhood friend with the four girls who are his neighbors. Akina the sporty girl, Megumi the girl with big boobs, Ayaka the weird girl who never speaks, Akira the class rep. They often came to his house to play. What they don’t realize is the fat guy with mind control raping the girl without them perceiving him. The MC loves the sporty girl, and he confessed. They had sex she got pregnant, so they dropped out school. But he still worked hard for her even though it’s not easy for a drop out like him and he only got hard manual labors.
